## Get in Touch

Have a question or want to collaborate? Fill out the form below — your message will be sent straight to my inbox.

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/YOUR_FORM_ID" method="POST" style="max-width:600px; margin-top:1.5rem;">
  <label for="name">Name:</label><br>
  <input type="text" id="name" name="name" required style="width:100%; padding:8px; border-radius:6px;"><br><br>

  <label for="email">Email:</label><br>
  <input type="email" id="email" name="_replyto" required style="width:100%; padding:8px; border-radius:6px;"><br><br>

  <label for="message">Message:</label><br>
  <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="6" required style="width:100%; padding:8px; border-radius:6px;"></textarea><br><br>

  <button type="submit" class="button" style="background-color:#007acc; color:white; padding:12px 20px; border:none; border-radius:8px;">
    ✉️ Send Message
  </button>
</form>
